[Think Stats Chapter 4 Exercise 2](http://greenteapress.com/thinkstats2/html/thinkstats2005.html#toc41) (a random distribution)

```python
import numpy as np
import thinkstats2
import thinkplot
```

```python
one_thousand = np.random.random(1000)
```

```python
thousand_pmf = thinkstats2.Pmf(one_thousand, label = "random")
thinkplot.Pmf(thousand_pmf, linewidth=0.07)
thinkplot.Config(xlabel="value", ylabel="PMF")
```

![img](data:image/png;base64,)

The distribution does not appear to be uniform in the PMF 

```python
thousand_cdf = thinkstats2.Cdf(one_thousand, label="random")
thinkplot.Cdf(thousand_cdf)
thinkplot.Show(xlabel="value", ylabel='CDF')
```

![img](data:image/png;base64,)

In the CDF the distribution looks uniform.
